languages.text: {n}Вокс-синтезатор изрекает с легкой неуверенностью:{/n} "Я решил подкрепить свои слова отрывком из проповеди благословенного Амарната "Об утрате функциональности Внутри и Вовне", стих IV. Согласно моему анализу он был... уместен".

{n}Pasqal's vox-synth crackles somewhat tentatively,{/n} "I decided to sustain my words with an excerpt from one of the blessed Amarnat's sermons, 'On Loss of Internal and External Function,' Verse IV. My analysis deemed it... appropriate."
languages.original_text: {n}Вокс-синтезатор изрекает с легкой неуверенностью:{/n} "Я решил подкрепить свои слова отрывком из проповеди благословенного Амарната "Об утрате функциональности Внутри и Вовне", стих IV. Согласно моему анализу он был... уместен".

traits.locale_text: {n}The vox-synth says, somewhat tentatively,{/n} "I have decided to back up my words with an excerpt from one of the blessed Amarnat's sermons, On Loss of Internal and External Function, Verse IV. My analysis has deemed it... appropriate."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}パスカルのヴォクス・シンセが控えめにパチパチと鳴る。{/n}「自分は自分の言葉を、祝福されしアマルナトの説教のひとつ、第4章『内部および外部の機能の喪失』からの抜粋とともにバックアップすると決めました。自分の分析ではそれは…適切だとみなされます」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox-synth crackles somewhat tentatively,{/n} "I decided to sustain my words with an excerpt from one of the blessed Amarnat's sermons, 'On Loss of Internal and External Function,' Verse IV. My analysis deemed it... appropriate."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルのヴォクス・シンセが控えめにパチパチと鳴る。{/n}「自分は自分の言葉を、祝福されしアマルナトの説教のひとつ、第4章『内部および外部の機能の喪失』からの抜粋とともにバックアップすると決めました。自分の分析ではそれは…適切だとみなされます」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡的音阵装置响起了不太确定的声音。{/n}“我刚刚决定用阿玛纳特的一段布道支持我的论点，是《论内在和外在功能的丧失》的第四节。我的分析认为这段话……很合适。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox-synth crackles somewhat tentatively,{/n} "I decided to sustain my words with an excerpt from one of the blessed Amarnat's sermons, 'On Loss of Internal and External Function,' Verse IV. My analysis deemed it... appropriate."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡的音阵装置传来了不太确定的声音。{/n}“我刚刚决定用阿玛纳特的一段布道支持我的论点，是《论内在和外在功能的丧失》的第四节。我的分析认为这段话……很合适。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqals Vox-Synth knistert etwas zögerlich:{/n} "Ich habe mich entschieden, meine Worte mit einem Auszug aus einer Predigt des gesegneten Amarnat zu untermauern, 'Über den Verlust interner und externer Funktion', Vers IV. Meine Analyse hält ihn für ... angemessen."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox-synth crackles somewhat tentatively,{/n} "I decided to sustain my words with an excerpt from one of the blessed Amarnat's sermons, 'On Loss of Internal and External Function,' Verse IV. My analysis deemed it... appropriate."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Vox-Synth sagt wohlüberlegt:{/n} "Ich habe mich entschieden, meine Worte mit einem Auszug aus einer Predigt des gesegneten Amarnat zu untermauern, 'Über den Verlust interner und externer Funktion', Vers IV. Meine Analyse hält ihn für ... angemessen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le synthétiseur-vox de Pasqal reprend la parole d'un ton quelque peu hésitant :{/n} « J'ai décidé d'étayer mes propos à l'aide d'un extrait des sermons sacrés d'Amarnat intitulé "De la perte des fonctions internes et externes", verset IV. Mon analyse de la situation l'a jugé... pertinent. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox-synth crackles somewhat tentatively,{/n} "I decided to sustain my words with an excerpt from one of the blessed Amarnat's sermons, 'On Loss of Internal and External Function,' Verse IV. My analysis deemed it... appropriate."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le synthétiseur-vox reprend la parole d'un ton quelque peu hésitant :{/n} « J'ai décidé d'étayer mes propos à l'aide d'un extrait des sermons sacrés d'Amarnat intitulé "De la perte des fonctions internes et externes", verset IV. Mon analyse de la situation l'a jugé... pertinent. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}El voco sintetizador de Pasqal chisporrotea con cierta vacilación.{/n} «He decidido respaldar mis palabras con un fragmento de uno de los sermones del bendito Amarnat: Sobre la pérdida de funciones internas y externas, versículo IV. Mi análisis lo ha considerado... apropiado».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox-synth crackles somewhat tentatively,{/n} "I decided to sustain my words with an excerpt from one of the blessed Amarnat's sermons, 'On Loss of Internal and External Function,' Verse IV. My analysis deemed it... appropriate."

traits.locale_text: {n}El vocosintetizador habla con cierta vacilación.{/n} «He decidido respaldar mis palabras con un fragmento de uno de los sermones del bendito Amarnat: Sobre la pérdida de funciones internas y externas, versículo IV. Mi análisis lo ha considerado... apropiado».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın voks sentezleyicisi, sanki tereddütteymişçesine tıkırdıyor.{/n} "Sözlerimi, kutsanmış Amarnat'ın vaazlarından biri olan 'Dâhili ve Haricî Fonksiyonların Kaybı Üzerine'nin dördüncü ayetinden alıntı yaparak devam ettirmeye karar verdim. Analizlerim sonucunda bu... Uygun bulundu."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox-synth crackles somewhat tentatively,{/n} "I decided to sustain my words with an excerpt from one of the blessed Amarnat's sermons, 'On Loss of Internal and External Function,' Verse IV. My analysis deemed it... appropriate."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal'ın voks sentezleyicisi sanki tereddütteymişçesine tıkırdıyor:{/n} "Sözlerimi, kutsanmış Amarnat'ın vaazlarından biri olan 'Dâhili ve Haricî Fonksiyonların Kaybı Üzerine'nin IV. ayetinden alıntı yaparak devam ettirmeye karar verdim. Analizlerim sonucunda bu... Uygun bulundu."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
